rpi2caster - Raspberry Pi controls a Monotype composition caster
----------------------------------------------------------------

To start, enter:

./rpi2caster.py

and choose option(s) from menu.

You can also start in the casting or inventory management mode.
To do it, enter:

./rpi2caster.py c (or ./rpi2caster.py cast)

If you want to start in casting mode - you can specify the file to cast
in the command line:

./rpi2caster.py c /path/to/file

Use [TAB] key for name auto-completion - enter a part of the name, then
press [TAB] once or twice. If more than one file or directory matches the
entered name, they will be displayed. Enter some more characters then
press [TAB] again.
